instructions: Ensure your iPhone is powered off. Plug the USB cable into the iPhone and computer. On your computer, start iTunes. On your iPhone, press and quickly release the Volume Up button. Press and quickly release the Volume Down button. Press and hold the (SIDE) Power button until you see connected to iTunes screen on your iPhone. On the computer, when prompted that there is a problem with the iPhone that requires it to be updated or restored, click Restore. Review the warning that explains what it means to reset your phone to its factory default. Click Restore and Update iTunes will begin to restore the setting to factory default on the iPhone. Your iPhone has been restored (reset) successfully.
